Projects

Things I have built...

  •

    React Counter Demo

    This is a React project to demonstrate my knowledge in handling events, working with props/state, and applying the concept of lifting the state. The page is styled with CSS modules and unit tests with React Testing Library.

  • Clear View Escapes

    Conceptualized a mock landing page for a travel company to demonstrate modern skills, tools, and best-practices.

  • Wrong Turn Winery

    Translated an HTML template into a dynamic WordPress site with custom posts and fields. Interfaced a filtered live search function utilizing the WP REST API and JavaScript.
    Login Details
    Username: test-user Password: test-user

  • Omnifood Delivery Website

    A self initiated website converted from a PSD file to demonstrate responsive design.

  • Vue Appointment Setter

    A single page app written in Vue.js that creates, reads, updates, and soft deletes appointments for a dentist schedule. All the appointments are editable (excluding date).

  • Hack for LA Website

    Regularly contribute to the Hack for Los Angeles website. Collaborating with other developers, designers, and project managers on maintaining and improving the Jekyll-based website via GitHub.
